snippet: The embattled president’s party hopes she will agree to resign by April instead, arguing that impeachment would then be unnecessary....
abstract: South Korea's three opposition parties announce plans for Dec 9 vote on motion to impeach Pres Park Geun-hye.
lead_paragraph: The embattled president’s party hopes she will agree to resign by April instead, arguing that impeachment would then be unnecessary.

headline.main: South Korean Opposition Vows to Impeach Park Geun-hye Next Week
headline.print_headline: South Korean Opposition Vows to Pursue President’s Impeachment
